import { Component} from '@angular/core'; interface Product { name: string; brand: string; price: number; description: string; } @Component({ selector: 'app-qlsp', templateUrl: './qlsp.component.html', styleUrls: ['./qlsp.component.css'] }) export class QlspComponent { }
